creator: srinivas_b_g@rediffmail.com
text:
URI with Multi-Byte characters are not handled appropriately by tomcat.When 
application is deployed to tomcat and the application has multi-Byte 
characters and when the application is launched, the HTTP Status 404 error 
comes up.This after changing the encoding to UTF_8 in web.xml and URIEncoding 
to UTF-8 in server.xml for connector tags.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This has been tested a quite a lot so I am little (but not entirely) surprised
you found an issue.

Bug reports are only valid if there is enough information in the report for a
developer to reproduce the problem. This report does not contain sufficient
information. Therefore, I am marking it as invalid for now.

The report may be re-opened, and someone will look at it, once there is enough
information to reproduce the issue you are seeing.
